import React from 'react' import './sortBy.css' import propTypes from 'prop-types' import { SortName } from '../../constants/Grid.constants.Heading' function SortBy(props) { return (

{props.children}

{SortName}

) } SortBy.propTypes={ children: propTypes.string, sort: propTypes.array } export default SortBy
